alert.note: Alert for Lee; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 4:20PM EDT until April 06 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 419 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leesburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Warwick, Starksville, Scrutchins, Chokee, Neyami, Philema, Century, Jordan Place, Mossy Dell and Oakfield. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
